welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haubourdin, a charming town in France known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Lesquin Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
